data.title: DVX – Justin R. Durban
data.text:
Synopsis: Robert S. Cristo Sr. confronts his only son knowing that he will die that very day. Before he passes, he must convince his son to accept his legacy and take over his empire, Cristo Technologies. Cast: Cristo: Dan Payne Robert: Matt Thompson (dvx Avataur) Hanna: Amanda Lynn Hills Guard 1: Tom Read more…

Kids in the middle of the woods + Creatures = Terror (HorrorFest 06) (co-directed) *Top 10 Film @ DVXUSER.com Cast: Christian David : Kevin Jaklyn Lyons : Chelsi Matt Thompson : Brett Taleia Mueller : Katie Saul Dapsis as “The Ranger” Crew: Written & Directed by: Matt Thompson Co-directed by: Justin R. Durban Read more…

“Some powers are gifted at birth. … Some are not. Some of those with powers are considered heros… … Some are… It’s what you do with your gift.” “The Stars Above” Evil overtakes Good. Duration: 5:12 Camera: DVX100a Credits: Written Directed Performances Camera Edited VFX SFX Music Score (All) Justin R. Read more…
